item.title: 英伟达 2,400 亿美元的暴跌导致半导体股暴跌
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）股价暴跌，拖累了其他半导体企业。【原文：Nvidia Corp. shares are tumbling and dragging the rest of the semiconductor complex down with it.】

item.title: Galderma 所有者希望在首次公开募股后出售 12 亿美元的股份
item.description: 瑞士护肤品巨头高德美集团（Galderma Group AG）在今年欧洲最大的首次公开募股中成功上市，几个月后，高德美集团的私募股权支持者正寻求出售该公司价值 12 亿美元的股份。【原文：The private equity backers of Galderma Group AG are looking to sell $1.2 billion worth of shares in the Swiss skincare giant just months after taking it public in one of Europe’s largest initial public offerings this year.】

item.title: 欧佩克产量保持稳定，利比亚的损失被其他地区的增长所抵消
item.description: 欧佩克上个月的石油产量变化不大，因为利比亚的中断被其他成员国的微弱增长所抵消。【原文：OPEC’s oil production was little changed last month, as disruption in Libya was offset by marginal gains in other members.】

item.title: 今年最繁忙的一天：拉丁美洲加入债券销售热潮
item.description: 拉美借款人正排队进入全球债券市场，这将是该地区今年硬通货债务发行最繁忙的一天。【原文：Latin American borrowers are lining up to tap global bond markets in what’s shaping up to be the region’s busiest day for hard-currency debt issuance this year.】

item.title: 加拿大央行降息后伦元涨势仍将持续
item.description: 当加拿大央行放宽货币政策、经济放缓时，货币经理人通常会为卢比走软做好准备。【原文：When the Bank of Canada eases monetary policy and the economy slows, money managers usually brace for a weaker loonie.】

item.title: 牛津纳米孔公司希望跻身英国富时 250 指数，以扩大投资者基础
item.description: 牛津纳米孔技术公司（Oxford Nanopore Technologies Plc）是一家 DNA 测序公司，自上市以来股价暴跌。【原文：Oxford Nanopore Technologies Plc, the DNA-sequencing firm whose shares have plunged since going public, is setting its sights on FTSE 250 index inclusion that would widen the pool of potential investors.】

item.title: 低迷期结束，欧洲可转换债券销售额达 10 亿美元
item.description: 两笔总价值 10 亿美元的可转换债券交易打破了欧洲股票资本市场夏季的沉寂，人们乐观地认为，在原本平静的一年里，此类交易活动将开始回暖。【原文：Two convertible bond deals worth $1 billion in total have broken the summer lull in European equity capital markets, amid optimism that such deal activity will start to pick up in an otherwise quiet year.】

item.title: 债券反弹 "追逐危险"，押注大幅降息
item.description: 债券价格因预期美联储将很快开始以对抗衰退的速度降息而反弹，这带来了一种风险，即交易商再次低估了美国经济的实力。【原文：Bond prices are rallying on expectations the Federal Reserve will soon start cutting interest rates at a recession-fighting pace, creating a risk that traders are again underestimating the strength of the US economy.】

item.title: 打捞船员放弃拖曳红海遇险油轮的尝试
item.description: 打捞公司结束了在红海拖走一艘油轮的尝试，这艘油轮在也门胡塞武装分子的袭击后已燃烧多日，欧盟驻该地区的海军部队说。【原文：Salvage companies ended attempts to tow away an oil tanker in the Red Sea that’s been burning for days following attacks by Yemen’s Houthi militants, the European Union’s naval force in the region said.】

item.title: 市场效率降低，克里夫-阿斯内斯成了 "发牢骚的老家伙
item.description: 克利夫-阿斯内斯（Cliff Asness）说自己听起来像个 "发牢骚的老头"，但这并不妨碍他写下长达 23 页的最新论文：如今的金融市场已今非昔比。【原文：Cliff Asness says he sounds like an “old man whinging,” but that’s not stopping him from writing 23 pages on his latest thesis: Financial markets these days aren’t what they were.】

item.title: 美联储减息临近，外国投资者重投巴西股市
item.description: 8 月份，外国投资者向巴西股市投入了 100 亿雷亚尔（合 17.8 亿美元），这是今年以来最大的单月流入量，原因是对美联储准备降息的押注不断升温。【原文：Foreign investors poured 10 billion reais ($1.78 billion) into Brazil’s stock market in August — the biggest monthly inflow this year — on rising bets that the Federal Reserve its gearing up to cut rates.】

item.title: 富国银行罕见看跌波音股价，波音股价暴跌
item.description: 在富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）发表了一份罕见的看跌该股的报告，称很难看到该股的上涨空间后，波音公司周二股价暴跌。【原文：Boeing Co. slumped on Tuesday after Wells Fargo & Co. published a rare bearish take on the stock, saying it’s hard to see upside in the shares.】

item.title: Riot 称 Bitfarms 对 Stronghold 的收购 "令人担忧
item.description: 比特币矿商Riot Platforms Inc.警告竞争对手Bitfarms Ltd.不要在Bitfarms对一家较小的竞争对手提出收购要约后采取进一步行动。【原文：Bitcoin miner Riot Platforms Inc. warned rival Bitfarms Ltd. not to take further actions following Bitfarms’ takeover offer for a smaller competitor.】

item.title: Raising Cane's 启动 5 亿美元贷款销售以偿还债务
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，快餐连锁店 Raising Cane's Restaurants LLC 计划从杠杆贷款市场借款 5 亿美元，用于偿还现有债务。【原文：Fast-food chain Raising Cane’s Restaurants LLC plans to borrow $500 million from the leveraged loan market to pay back existing debt, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度将放宽外国人购买国债的注册限制
item.description: 印度证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Board）董事会成员表示，该委员会正在考虑一项计划，以放宽希望投资政府债券的外国人的注册程序。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Board of India is considering a plan to ease the registration process for foreigners looking to invest in government bonds, according to its board member.】

item.title: TransDigm 提供 30 亿美元债务以支付股息
item.description: TransDigm Group Inc. 正在发行 30 亿美元的新债，以资助可能达到 45 亿美元的股东特别现金分红。【原文：TransDigm Group Inc. is offering $3 billion of new debt to fund a special cash divided to shareholders that could reach $4.5 billion.】

item.title: 优步为首次蓝筹债券销售召集投资者
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is sounding out investors on Tuesday for its potential first investment-grade bond sale.】

item.title: 企业扎堆债券市场，创下最繁忙一天纪录
item.description: 周二上午，创纪录数量的蓝筹企业蜂拥进入公司债券市场，它们希望在美国总统大选前发行债券，以利用更低的借贷成本。【原文：A record number of blue-chip firms are swarming the corporate bond market Tuesday morning, taking advantage of cheaper borrowing costs as they look to issue debt ahead of the US presidential election.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行从所罗门公司聘用莱昂哈特负责全球零售交易
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）聘请凯茜-莱昂哈特（Cathy Leonhardt）担任其投资银行部零售业务全球主管。【原文：Barclays Plc has hired Cathy Leonhardt to be global head of retail within its investment banking division.】

item.title: 狂热市场中炙手可热的 ETF 资金流助推 6,090 亿美元的巨额收益
item.description: 你的一半同事可能刚刚在欧洲度过了八月，但在 ETF 蓬勃发展的世界里却没有假期的萧条。【原文：Half your coworkers might have just spent August in Europe, but there were no holiday doldrums in the booming world of ETFs.】

item.title: 中国灰色市场正在主导奢侈品牌的在线销售
item.description: 据一份新报告称，在中国占主导地位的电子商务领域，中国的灰色市场（即以高折扣出售全新正品的市场）正日益使一些全球奢侈品巨头的官方销售渠道相形见绌。【原文：China’s gray market — where brand new, authentic products are sold at steep discounts — is increasingly dwarfing some global luxury giants’ official sales channels in the country’s dominant e-commerce space, according to a new report.】

item.title: 亚当-波森谈美联储大转向的风险
item.description:
劳动力市场需要 "来福枪 "吗？【原文：

Did the labor market warrant a “rifle shot”?

】

item.title: 英国石油公司鹿特丹炼油厂因停电而停工
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）位于荷兰的炼油厂在周二早些时候发生停电事故后停产。【原文：BP Plc halted its oil refinery in the Netherlands after a power outage earlier on Tuesday.】

item.title: 一级方程式将通过贷款市场为 MotoGP 交易借款 8.5 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，以高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Banks led by Goldman Sachs Group Inc. launched an $850 million leveraged loan offering to help fund Formula 1 owner Liberty Media Corp.’s acquisition of MotoGP World Championship, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 布伦特原油跌破每桶 75 美元，抹去 2024 年涨幅
item.description: 由于对世界两大经济体需求的担忧盖过了地缘政治风险加剧的影响，布伦特油价抹去了 2024 年的涨幅。【原文：Brent erased its 2024 gains as concerns about demand in the world’s two biggest economies overshadow heightened geopolitical risks.】

item.title: 乔希-哈里斯的 26North 将在首笔私募股权交易中收购 ArchKey
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. co-founder Josh Harris’ alternative asset manager 26North Partners has struck its first private equity deal.】

item.title: 中国奥莫达在西班牙销量增长 8,167% 跃居特斯拉榜首
item.description: 奇瑞汽车股份有限公司的欧慕达上个月在西班牙的销量超过了特斯拉、吉普和菲亚特，这是中国汽车制造商雄心勃勃地进军欧洲的一个可喜迹象。【原文：Chery Automobile Co.’s Omoda outsold Tesla, Jeep and Fiat in Spain last month, a promising sign for the Chinese automaker’s ambitious push into Europe.】

item.title: 太阳能制造商 Maxeon 面临 "重大 "逆风，放弃指导目标
item.description: 光伏电池板制造商Maxeon Solar Technologies Ltd.将不提供第三季度业绩指导，原因是市场逆风 "严重"，包括屋顶市场疲软、项目延期和美国组件进口受阻。【原文：Photovoltaic panel manufacturer Maxeon Solar Technologies Ltd. won’t provide third-quarter guidance amid “significant” market headwinds that include a weak rooftop market, project delays and detained module imports into the US.】

item.title: 巴西石油巨头巴西国家石油公司利用全球市场出售美元债券
item.description: 巴西国有石油生产商巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）自去年以来首次重返全球债务市场，加入了其他新兴市场公司和政府的抛售浪潮。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled oil producer Petroleo Brasileiro SA is returning to global debt markets for the first time since last year, joining a wave of sales by other emerging-market companies and governments.】

item.title: Ukrenergo 两名监事会成员因首席执行官下台而辞职
item.description: 乌克兰电网运营商 Ukrenergo 监事会的两名成员辞职，以抗议本周解雇首席执行官沃洛德梅尔-库德列茨基（Volodymyr Kudrytskyi）的决定。【原文：Two members of the supervisory board of Ukrainian power grid operator Ukrenergo resigned in protest against a decision to dismiss Chief Executive Officer Volodymyr Kudrytskyi this week, which they called “politically motivated” and groundless.】
